html:
Tourism, Wildlife and the Natural Environment

The natural environment provides a fundamentally important resource for those involved in the tourism industry. The maintenance of this environment through sustainable tourism practices is therefore of paramount importance to the long-term success and viability of the industry. This module will thus provide the student with an opportunity to explore the attraction for, but also potential impact of tourists engaged in nature, wildlife and/or ecotourism activities in a natural setting.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate an understanding of the importance of, as well as the key issues relating to sustainability, biodiversity and conservation in terms of the tourism industry’s engagement with the natural environmen

+  Have explored a range of tourism products and experiences focused upon the natural environment

+  Have explored in detail the range of impacts resulting from tourists and their chosen activities within the natural environment

Module Content:
